name: TK-cosgan
description:
Space.
Fluctuations..
Time...

TK-cosgan is a hyper-casual game with a special attitude to the surrounding sounds.
Simple gameplay - moving around the universe, interact with other cosmic entities. But remember that the interaction of objects in the universe occurs without your participation.
Self-setting the time of the game session will allow you to relax - play for just a minute, or try to survive in cold space for more than an hour.
To complicate the game session, additional features are provided - add new planets to the game universe.

Have fun!
